attributes.action: Charge the people who drink to excess to pay for the services required
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of penalising everyone for the individuals who drink to excess and cause involvement with Police, Fire, Ambulance, Hospital be charged for the services and time thus putting the responsibility on the person who causes the problem.  Further measures can be applied by the employer to withold a days pay for drink related absenses.
